Text:
In this movie Jackie Chan impersonates the inspector Wing, who is the 

Hong Kong police's resident best cop. He's the best of all, cracking 

every case he handles in record time. There is no one like him. The 

actor Nicholas Tse impersonates Fung, who is a rebel, a typically 

disaffected but street-smart Hong Kong youth who wastes his life in 

video game arcades all the time.Fung can talk very cheap, and no one 

talks cheaper than him. Fung wants to be a police officer but due to 

his family's
criminal background..... For more information go to 

wing-chunws/New%20Police%20Story.html
